mapper.select: SELECT t.test_title testTitle , t.test_date testDate , q.question_no questionNo , q.question_idx questionIdx , q.question_title questionTitle , e.example_no exampleNo , e.example_idx exampleIdx , e.example_title exampleTitle , e.example_ox exampleOx From test t INNER JOIN question q ON t.test_no = q.test_no INNER JOIN example e ON q.question_no = e.question_no WHERE t.test_no = #{testNo}
